title: INTERNSHIP 2026
description: A great opportunity to kickstart your career with Wipro Limited through the 2026 Internship Program in engineering and technology.

title: Elevate Internship Program
description: Join our Elevate Internship Program to gain hands-on experience in business and program management. Work closely with our CBCF and Business teams, with an opportunity for full-time conversion based on performance.
requirements: Open to freshers with a keen interest in business and program management. Must be pursuing or have completed a relevant degree.

title: Student Researcher, 2026
description: Join Google's Student Researcher Program to work on cutting-edge research and contribute to real-world, large-scale problems across Google’s various research teams, including Google DeepMind, Google Research, and Google Cloud.
requirements: Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's, Master's, or PhD program in Computer Science, Linguistics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Applied Mathematics, Operations Research, Economics, or Natural Sciences. Experience in one or more areas of computer science (e.g., Machine Learning, Data Science, Computer Vision, etc.).
preferred_qualifications: Experience with research communities, contributing to research papers in major journals/conferences. Experience with programming languages like Python, Java, C++, etc.

title: Software Development Opportunities
description: Join Dexcom Corporation as we continue to lead in continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) and expand into new areas of consumer health technology. We're looking for software developers to work on iOS & Android apps, cloud infrastructure, and cybersecurity.
requirements: Passionate individuals with skills in iOS & Android development, cloud infrastructure, or security. Open to all levels of experience.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with mobile app development (iOS/Android), cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, etc.), and cybersecurity best practices.

title: Freshers Hiring – Software Development Roles
description: We are looking for enthusiastic and motivated fresh graduates to join our growing team. If you are eager to learn and build your career, apply now to be a part of Chella Software’s dynamic environment.
requirements: Fresh graduates with a B.E (ECE, EEE, CSE & AI-DS), B.Tech (IT) degree.
preferred_qualifications: Strong interest in software development and the willingness to learn and grow in a dynamic environment.

title: International Chat Process - Tech Mahindra
description: Tech Mahindra is hiring for the International Chat Process. Excellent communication skills are required. Immediate joiners are preferred. Work from office position in Noida with rotational shifts.
requirements: Graduates & Undergraduates with excellent communication skills. Immediate joiners preferred.
preferred_qualifications: Prior experience in customer support or chat process is a plus.
